metadata.title: CVE-2022-48749 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dpu: invalid parameter check in dpu_setup_dspp_pccThe function performs a check on the "ctx" input parameter, however, itis used before the check.Initialize the "base" variable after the sanity check to avoid apossible NULL pointer dereference.Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493866 ("Null pointer dereference")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
